metadata.name: AWS SecurityHub Findings Evasion
metadata.comment: Detects the modification of the findings on SecurityHub.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('securityhub.amazonaws.com') AND (lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in ('batchupdatefindings', 'deleteinsight', 'updatefindings', 'updateinsight')))

output.summary: Detects the modification of the findings on SecurityHub.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: sourceIPAddress, userIdentity.arn False positives: 1. System or Network administrator behaviors 2. DEV, UAT, SAT environment. You should apply this rule with PROD environment only. Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/securityhub/
